description: Implementing Hazel, a new live functional programming environment featuring typed holes.
Collaborating with 30+ contributors to develop using a dialect of Ocaml (ReasonML).
Designing and implementing a non-biased method of determining the perception gap in opposing opinions.
Tackling reported opinion perception gaps of 20%+ and eliminating 10%+ coder disagreement rates from alternative methodologies.
Advised by Dr. Grant Schoenebeck of University of Michigan.
Developing full-stack using Django, Python, Bootstrap, and HTML/CSS to iteratively improve the interactive web application.
Published the web application on Heroku through its CLI with a Postgres backend and forwarded multiple domains.

experiences.role: Discrete Math and Intro to Programming
description: Lead sessions for 100+ students and weekly discussions of 40+ students with 900+ students enrolled for the course.
Taught for Winter '19, Spring '19, Fall '19, and Winter '20 with every student evaluation field median score above 4.0/5.0.
Founded a Blockchain startup to solve opioid over-prescription and doctor shopping that caused the Opioid Crisis.
Produced a prototype using C++ and Qt GUI and won $9,000+ from multiple competitions such as the International Blockchain Olympiad.

experiences.role: Discrete Math and Intro to Programming
description: Co-authored 6 publications in peer-reviewed journals with 3 lead authorships and replaced a decades-old evolutionary model.
"A tRNA- and Anticodon-Centric View of the Evolution of Aminoacyl-tRNA Synthetases, tRNAomes, and the Genetic Code" in Life, May 2019
"Type-II tRNAs and Evolution of Translation Systems and the Genetic Code" in International Journal of Molecular Sciences, October 2018
"Aminoacyl-tRNA synthetase evolution and sectoring of the genetic code" in Transcription, May 2018
"Homology threading to generate RNA polymerase structures" in Protein Expression and Purification, February 2018
"Rooted tRNAomes and evolution of the genetic code" in Transcription, February 2018
"tRNA evolution from the proto-tRNA minihelix world" in Transcripotion, January 2016
Optimized the position of zinc molecules in proteins by using JAVA to calculate 3D coordinates to be represented in PDB format.
Scraped databases using Beautifulsoup and Python to statistically calculate evolutionary distances against randomly mutated sequences.
Visualized the statistical analysis from Python scripts using R and iGraph library.

projects.title: M Ticket Matcher
description: Centralized highly scattered student football ticket buy and sell offers with certified users.
Used Django framework with PostgreSQL and Bootstrap with custom CSS to be deployed on Heroku.
Hosted 50+ offers and 200+ contact requests within a month.

projects.title: Logical Equivalence Calculator
description: Created a calculator that solves and explains logical equivalence problems to help EECS 203 students.
Parsed logical equivalence expressions in a n-ary tree and minimized the number of elements.

projects.title: Real-time Multiplayer Gomoku
description: Developed the game using Javascript and integrated Django and websocket using Django Channels to relay data in real-time.

projects.title: Platform Independent Digital Creatures
description: Designed and developed a decentralized system to allow permanent ownership of digital assets and creatures.
Wrote the specs and created a C++ model for my team and later ported to Ethereum smart contracts using Solidity.
